scripts.deploy: wrangler deploy --minify --outdir dist --upload-source-maps --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$(sentry-cli releases propose-version)
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: _SENTRY_RELEASE=$(sentry-cli releases propose-version) && sentry-cli releases new $_SENTRY_RELEASE --org=none-xxz --project=node-cloudflare-workers && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org=none-xxz --project=node-cloudflare-workers --release=$_SENTRY_RELEASE --strip-prefix 'dist/..' dist
